0010 001 000010101；R1=0000 0001 0010 0000
0100 1 00000001000  ；jsr R7=3002,PC+1+8
0101 010 001 1 00111 ;R2  =  R1 AND 0000 0000 0000 0111
0001 001 010 000 100；R1=R2+R4
0001 000 001 1 11001 ;R0   =   RX-7
0000 001 111111011  ;正数->
0001 000 001 1 11001 ;R0   =   RX-7
0000 100 000000001 ;负数
0001 001 001 1 11001；R1=R1-7
1111 000 000100101;停止
0101 010 010 1 00000 ;TIAO R2清0
0101 011 011 1 00000 ；R3清0
0101 100 100 1 00000 ；R4清0
0001 010 010 1 00001 ；R2=R2+1
0001 011 011 1 01000 ；R3=R3+8
0101 101 011 000 001 ;R5  =  R3 AND R1
0000 010 000 000001;0->BZ
0001 100 010 000 100;R4=R2+R4
0001 010 010 000 010 ;BZ R2=R2+R2,R2左移
0001 /011 011 000 011 ;RX=R3+R3,R3左移->RX ；    R3=R3+R3
0000 /001 111111010；BZ R5  =  R3 AND R1  ；001
1100 000 111 000000；return R2  =  R1 AND
0000000100100000
